Reviews.Title: It's a BlackBerry, but not the one I ordered.
Reviews.Author: Blackberry User
Reviews.Content: The item i recieved came here only 8 days after i purchased it. It came in the condition described. The problem is, it isn't exactly what I ordered. It is a Blackberry, but it isn't the 8830 like I paid for. Instead, I got a Curve 8330 which works with VZW. I am overseas in Kuwait and I ordered the 8830 because it had a slot for a sim card. The Curve 8130 VZW phone does not. VZW does not use sim cards. I am very unhappy about this.

Reviews.Title: Watch the fine print!
Reviews.Author: BETH KELLEY
Reviews.Content: The phone is fine. However I am displeased with amazons marketing of this phone. The phone was not "unlocked" as the title states. When I brought this up with seller he stated that Amazon inserted this I to the title, not himself.I feel items in bold print in the title should be accurate. I had to spend additional time and money to unlock the phone for global use.

Reviews.Title: Travel Buddy
Reviews.Author: RumPunch
Reviews.Content: I wanted a phone for international travel and to use when I am in the States for short visits.  This phone fits the bill and at less than $75, perfect.

Reviews.Title: Oldy but goody
Reviews.Author: Wrestlers mom2
Reviews.Content: This phone is an older model phone but for people that are use to the older versions its perfect. There is no camera on this blackberry model but there doesnt claim to be. Just fyi for future buyers. It is brand new and was all it said it would be.

Reviews.Title: phone as expected
Reviews.Author: sailorbob
Reviews.Content: good phone, good customer service received after minor problem with previous phone order. Would not hesitate to recommend this vendor.

Reviews.Title: good service
Reviews.Author: Raymond Jones
Reviews.Content: I am please with the servive, and will continu to shop with your business.I have been shopping at Amazom for some years now and will continue

Reviews.Title: this conpany is  not good
Reviews.Author: suprised
Reviews.Content: i ordered two phones from them the two phone came broken i sent them back i don't feel i should have to pay them to restock broken goods but they charge me anyway and only gave me back half of my money because the value of the broken phones that they sent me went down.i would not advise anyone to buy from them they are rude and don't have good people skills.i'm so sorry i spent my money on they useless stuff.

Reviews.Title: Broke
Reviews.Author: anisa xhaja
Reviews.Content: This phone broke after using it for a day. You couldn't turn it on or off. The screen froze and couldn't be used after this happened.

Reviews.Title: Rim blackberry 8830 phone
Reviews.Author: Ahmad s. Sallah
Reviews.Content: Phone was up to my expectation and i like it . I did recommend it to my brother ( Yakubu ) who also bought more than 4 pcs

Reviews.Title: don't have a camera
Reviews.Author: sachin Toshniwal
Reviews.Content: in this phone camera is not available and i can't use internet in this phone and this is not very good...i don't like it...sorry

Reviews.Title: Bad Purchase
Reviews.Author: TT that's Me "TT that's Me"
Reviews.Content: I bought this phone as a backup phone for my daughter.  It was horrible.  You definitely pay for what you get.
